section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Processors typically apply bold highlighting to the contents of the b element.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The b element is specialized from ph. This element is part of the highlighting domain.

example.title: Example
example.draft-comment: Use an actual code sample from spec.
example.p: The following code sample illustrates how bold highlighting is used to draw a reader's attention to XXX:
example.codeblock: The new features in our product are really going to improve your workday!
